original_text: Its head was made from pure gold. The top of its body and its arms were made from silver. Its lower body was made from bronze.
korean_text: 그 우상의 머리는 순금이요 가슴과 두 팔은 은이요 배와 넓적다리는 놋이요

sentences.original_text: Its head was made from pure gold.
The top of its body was made from silver.
Its arms were made from silver.
Its lower body was made from bronze.
